data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Fiorentina at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
In the minute 3, Free kick Fiorentina.
In Florence, Fiorentina push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Fiorentina in the half of Benevento.
In the minute 5, Davide Ghersini awards Benevento a goal kick.
In Florence a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Fiorentina's Cristiano Biraghi gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Artemio Franchi. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 7, Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
Fiorentina push forward at Stadio Artemio Franchi and Christian Kouame gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Benevento defence.
Davide Ghersini signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
In the minute 9, Benevento to take a throw-in in Fiorentina territory.
Davide Ghersini signals a free kick to Fiorentina.
Benevento awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 12, Davide Ghersini signals a Fiorentina throw-in in Benevento's half.
Free kick Fiorentina.
In Florence a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
Throw-in Fiorentina.
In Florence, Artur Ionita of Benevento is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 17, Can Fiorentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Benevento's half?
Davide Ghersini signals a free kick to Fiorentina.
Can Fiorentina capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 18, Kamil Glik (Benevento) has received a first yellow card.
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 20, Free kick for Fiorentina in the half of Benevento.
Ball safe as Benevento is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Fiorentina's Cristiano Biraghi misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 21, Ball goes out of play for a Benevento goal kick.
Davide Ghersini awards the away team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Fiorentina at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
In the minute 24, It's a goal kick for the away team in Florence.
Fiorentina drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Davide Ghersini signals a throw-in for Fiorentina, close to Benevento's area.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Benevento at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Benevento in their own half.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Benevento in the half of Fiorentina.
Free kick for Benevento in the half of Fiorentina.
Fiorentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 29, Fiorentina push upfield but Davide Ghersini quickly pulls them for offside.
Davide Ghersini awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 33, Throw-in for Fiorentina in the half of Benevento.
Benevento's Federico Barba gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Fiorentina have a goal kick.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
Davide Ghersini signals a Fiorentina throw-in in Benevento's half.
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 40, Fiorentina have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Benevento get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fiorentina's half?
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Pasquale Schiattarella.
In the minute 41, Franck Ribery is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Claudio Cesare Prandelli (Fiorentina) has taken off Franck Ribery who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Riccardo Saponara is the replacement.
Benevento's Pasquale Schiattarella looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 44, In Florence a free kick has been awarded the away team.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Davide Ghersini blows against Benevento's Pasquale Schiattarella for offside.
In the minute 45, Davide Ghersini signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
The first half has been concluded at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
The second-half has started.
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fiorentina to take a throw-in in Benevento territory.
In the minute 46, The away team have replaced Marco Sau with Roberto Insigne. This is the first substitution made today by Filippo Inzaghi.
In the minute 49, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Gabriele Moncini for Benevento who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Davide Ghersini signals a Fiorentina throw-in in Benevento's half.
Gabriele Moncini is back on his feet again.
In the minute 51, Ball safe as Benevento is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Benevento get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fiorentina's half?
Free kick Fiorentina.
In the minute 52, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Riccardo Improta scores to make it 0-1 at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Great play from Roberto Insigne to set up the goal.
In the minute 53, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Fiorentina close to the penalty box.
Gaetano Letizia (Benevento) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Davide Ghersini.
In the minute 54, Dusan Vlahovic (Fiorentina) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Benevento are caught offside.
Davide Ghersini waits before resuming play because Bartlomiej Dragowski for Fiorentina is still down.
In the minute 55, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Gabriele Moncini.
Claudio Cesare Prandelli (Fiorentina) is making a second substitution, with Patrick Cutrone replacing Christian Kouame.
Bartlomiej Dragowski has recovered and rejoins the match in Florence.
Erick Pulgar is replacing Alfred Duncan for the home team.
In the minute 56, The home team replace Igor with Pol Lirola.
Gabriele Moncini is back on the pitch.
In the minute 58, Benevento are coming forward and Artur Ionita gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Fiorentina have a goal kick.
Davide Ghersini signals a free kick to Benevento.
In the minute 59, Davide Ghersini signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
Throw-in Benevento.
The match at Stadio Artemio Franchi has been interrupted briefly for a check on Gaetano Castrovilli, who is down injured.
In the minute 62, Gaetano Castrovilli returns to the field for Fiorentina after picking up a slight injury.
Throw-in high up the field for Fiorentina in Florence.
Roberto Insigne gets his shot on target but fails to score for Benevento.
In the minute 64, Corner awarded to Benevento.
Luca Caldirola (Benevento) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Ball safe as Fiorentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
Attention is being given to Benevento’s Gaetano Letizia and play has been suspended briefly.
Christian Maggio (Benevento) has replaced the possibly injured Gaetano Letizia at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
In the minute 67, Fiorentina to take a throw-in in Benevento territory.
Benevento needs to be cautious. Fiorentina have an attacking throw-in.
Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Davide Ghersini.
In the minute 69, Benevento awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Benevento's Gabriele Moncini gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Fiorentina defender.
Throw-in for Fiorentina in the half of Benevento.
In the minute 72, Borja Valero is replacing Sofyan Amrabat for Fiorentina at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Davide Ghersini awards the away team a throw-in.
Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 74, At Stadio Artemio Franchi, Perparim Hetemaj has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Throw-in Benevento.
Benevento have been awarded a corner by Davide Ghersini.
In the minute 77, Benevento push upfield and Artur Ionita gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Fiorentina defence.
Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
German Pezzella (Fiorentina) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 78, It's a goal kick for the away team in Florence.
Filippo Inzaghi is making the team's third substitution at Stadio Artemio Franchi with Gianluca Lapadula replacing Gabriele Moncini.
In Florence Benevento attack through Roberto Insigne. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 79, Ball goes out of play for a Fiorentina goal kick.
Davide Ghersini signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
Goal kick for Benevento at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
In the minute 81, Fiorentina will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Benevento.
Benevento's Gianluca Lapadula is on target but unsuccessful.
Benevento have been awarded a corner by Davide Ghersini.
In the minute 82, Can Benevento capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fiorentina's half?
Throw-in for Fiorentina in their own half.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Fiorentina at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Davide Ghersini awards the home team a throw-in.
Andres Tello is on a sub for Riccardo Improta for Benevento.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 85, Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
Fiorentina drives forward and Dusan Vlahovic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Davide Ghersini signals a Fiorentina throw-in in Benevento's half.
In the minute 86, Davide Ghersini awards Benevento a goal kick.
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cristiano Biraghi (Fiorentina) has received a yellow card from Davide Ghersini.
In the minute 88, Fiorentina awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Fiorentina close to the penalty box.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Florence.
Throw-in for Benevento in their own half.
Artur Ionita for Benevento gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Fiorentina have a goal kick.
The fourth official's board shows 6 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Davide Ghersini signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
Goal kick for Fiorentina at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Davide Ghersini awards Fiorentina a goal kick.
Fiorentina have a dangerous throw-in.
Benevento's Gianluca Lapadula breaks free at Stadio Artemio Franchi. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Fiorentina goal kick.
Corner awarded to Benevento.
Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
Davide Ghersini awards Fiorentina a goal kick.
Can Fiorentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Benevento's half?
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-1.
Fiorentina's Pol Lirola has been booked in Florence.
